[vc_row row_btt_skin=”light” row_background_text_position=”front”][vc_column]

FURNACES [vc_empty_space height=”50px” el_id=”top-space”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_btt_skin=”light” row_background_text_position=”front” el_class=”main-column”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Professional Furnaces Services in Victoria, BC

The furnace is one of the most important and useful appliances in a home, especially in winter. A poorly performing furnace can spike your energy bill, create uneven room temperatures throughout your home, and require frequent repairs. Today, energy-saving furnaces can reach up to 98% efficiency, saving you up to 75% on your energy bill! 

4 Seasons provides installation, maintenance and repair services for furnaces in Victoria. We carry a wide selection of quality DAIKIN furnaces and offer professional furnace services to residential and commercial properties.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”16px”][vc_empty_space el_class=”disapearing-space”][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BwDJH8VicQs&feature=youtu.be&ab_channel=FortisBC-NaturalGas%26ElectricUtilityCompany” align=”center” title=”Things to know before your new high-efficiency furnace is installed”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Furnace Sales and Warranties

At 4 Seasons, we know it all starts with maintaining the lifespan of the best quality equipment. That’s why we provide customers with a promise of warranty. 4 Seasons is proud to offer Daikin due to their popularity and reliability. Daikin gas furnaces have a 12-year parts warranty, two years longer than any other gas furnace and a lifetime heat exchanger warranty when registered online within 60 days of installation. 

Most other brands offer a 5-year or a 10-year parts warranty, where Daikin goes above and beyond industry standards. The lifetime heat exchanger warranty is a true warranty, where other gas furnaces or fireplaces offer a finite number of years. Daikin will honor their heat exchanger warranty to homeowners as long as they own the house. Trust us to provide quality equipment as well as quality advice![/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space]

How much is a new furnace?

[vc_column_text]

A new furnace costs about $3000 – $3500 at the minimum, including installation. For a high-efficiency furnace, most homeowners in Canada will pay an average of $4000 to $6500+ subjective to size, brand, etc. Chat with us about your budget, home, and efficiency goals to choose the best furnace for your living space and financial needs.

[/vc_column_text]

What is the life expectancy of a furnace?

[vc_column_text]The life expectancy of a furnace in Canada on average ranges between 15 to 30 years. You can continue using your furnace after the 15-year mark, based on condition and repair costs. Some furnaces even reach the 30 year mark depending on their historical maintenance.[/vc_column_text]

Is it worth replacing an old furnace?

[vc_column_text]

Many factors unique to your furnace can indicate whether it’s time to repair or replace a furnace. Here are a few telltale signs that a replacement could be the better investment: 

 

•  your furnace is more than 15 years old

•  your home’s temperature is uneven

•  your furnace is noisy or produces soot

•  your energy bills are high

•  your furnace needs frequent repair

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1678105196980{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Furnace Repairs and Maintenance from 4 Seasons

You can rely on the certified technicians at 4 Seasons in Victoria, BC, for reliable furnace repairs and maintenance to get your gas fireplace or furnace up and running before the cold season sets in. In addition to checking for rust and corrosion, many components need annual maintenance to keep your furnace working efficiently. Some of the furnace parts that need to be checked annually include the following:

•  Drainage systems

•  Burners – flame sense, burner flame and ignition

•  Air intake grills and louvers

•  Blower wheels

•  Wires

•  Filters

 

To learn more about our furnace maintenance, repair, sales and installation services, please give us a call, or request a free in-home estimate.[/vc_column_text]

How do I know if my Furnace needs maintenance?

[vc_column_text]

Here are a few tell-tale signs that indicate your furnace may need maintenance or be replaced:

•  Energy bills go up despite the thermostat settings staying the same

•  Furnace begins to cycle on and off more frequently

•  Lower airflow from vents

•  Rust, cracks or corrosion seen on your furnace

•  Furnace is unusually noisy

[/vc_column_text]

What is the most common problem with furnaces?

[vc_column_text]The most common problems we see with furnaces in need of maintenance are the following: 

•  Dirty ductwork

•  Old filters

•  Faulty starting mechanism

•  Broken blower components

•  Malfunctioning heat exchanger

•  Bad Limit Switch

•  Thermostat in need of repair

•  Tripped circuit breaker[/vc_column_text]

Rebates Available

Take advantage of the rebates available at 4 Seasons on our services and products.

Free Estimates

Get in touch with us today for a free estimate for any of our services.
